news.title: Ireland’s European 1500m champion and Olympian Ciara Mageean (33) reveals cancer diagnosis
news.summary: Ciara Mageean has revealed that she’s been diagnosed with cancer.

news.title: Eight men jailed for combined 129 years after Ireland’s largest ever drugs haul on MV Matthew
news.summary: Eight men have received prison sentences totalling a combined 129 years in relation to Ireland's largest ever drugs seizure, which was made after soldiers dramatically intercepted a cargo ship two years ago.

news.title: Young man denies teacher 'groomed’ him as Leaving Cert student, but says they had sex in hotel after exams were over
news.summary: A young man has denied that his female English teacher “groomed” him while he was a Leaving Cert student, although they had sex in a hotel after the exams were finished.

news.title: ‘Unspeakable tragedy’ - school pays tribute to Ella McLaughlin (6), killed in Donegal crash that also claimed mother’s life
news.summary: A Donegal community has been plunged into grief after a mother and her six-year-old daughter lost their lives in a horrific road crash.

news.title: Where Michelin-star chefs go to eat a curry: ‘I think it’s some of the best food of any kind being served in Ireland right now’
news.summary: Curry is a dish with ancient roots and global reach. Most closely associated with India, it is found across much of Asia.
